name: Summer Solstice (Jaclyn)
description:
Summer Solstice

Summer loses her best friend to a demon attack and has to move out of her town.

This town refuses to believe in the importance of the Summer Solstice Rituals which means demons are allowed to run riot around the town.

When Spencer returns and the rituals start to go wrong, Summer realises there is something more demonic than she first thought.

  • Experience the Summer Solstice through unique mini-games
  • Build up her skills in the meditation room
  • Meet up with 3 other party members 
  • Solve puzzles
  • Fight bosses including Tod's ex-wife and a thicc crocodile king!
  • Can you beat all 11 bosses?
  • Save the windmill town from a tyrannical king
  • 2 dark spooky mines to explore 
  • 6 different areas to explore with over 100 maps 

Playtime information

Takes a minimum of 5 hours to beat 

Medium difficulty 

It is highly recommended you meet and add all the party members for the best experience (Summer, Tod, Smith & Sydney)

Don't forget to leave a review so I know what you thought and how I can improve with my next project!
